text: [Music]
whether you're aiming for a new job
career advancement or a career pivot or
you want to contribute more to your
field enhancing your qualifications is
key Stanford's graduate courses
certificates and degrees delivered
through Stanford online provide you with
access to Advanced rigorous technical
knowledge through a flexible online
program that can deep in your expertise
while you continue your career Stanford
online is the school of engineering's
portal for academ mic professional and
lifelong education offered by schools
and centers throughout Stanford
University Stanford's online courses for
academic credit for graduate
certificates and for degree programs
provide students with the challenging
and rewarding experience of our
traditional campus classrooms as an
online student you'll join your
on-campus counterparts to learn directly
from Stanford faculty you'll attend the
same live lectures as they take place on
campus so you'll gain knowledge based on
the latest faculty research if you need
more flexibility
you can watch the recorded version of
each lecture on demand you'll have
access to the teaching team through
online office hours recorded problem
sessions and online
forums taking individual courses for
academic credit can be an economical
short-term option for gaining specific
Advanced knowledge it's also a terrific
way to try out the time commitment and
rigor of a graduate course so you can be
confident that our graduate programs are
right for you you might choose to enroll
in individual courses as your schedule
allows and to study a variety of topics
you can continue to take available
graduate courses without ever committing
to a specific graduate program
acceptance into each course is based on
a short online application that is
reviewed by an academic department and
you'll receive 3 to five units of credit
in a Stanford University transcript for
every academic course you complete
successfully want to take your education
to the next level if you know that you'd
like to explore a topic in Greater
detail a graduate certificate program
can be the next step in your journey
that's where the power of St ability
comes into play to earn a graduate
certificate you can stack the additional
required courses to any already
qualifying completed cours work you need
only to complete a total of three to
four courses from your program within 3
years although many of our students
finish within 1 to two years and
stackability also means that if you want
to continue your education journey
through to a master's degree program
such as one offered by Stanford
University you may be able to apply up
to 18 of The Graduate credits you've
already earned toward a relevant program
depending on the policies of the program
you're admitted to this means that the
time and effort you've already invested
in graduate courses can shorten the time
it takes to earn a degree which is
especially important if you're balancing
both your work and your
education this need to balance work in
education is why Stanford's flexible
master's degree programs were designed
if you apply and are admitted to a
Stanford online supported master's
degree program through the full-time
student admission process and with the
same high standards you'll have the
unique opportunity to pursue the same
degree that full-time Stanford
University students pursue but on a
part-time basis you can take as few as
one to two courses per quarter so as not
to interrupt your career and in many
departments you can switch your student
status between part-time and full-time
to accommodate a change in your schedule
or bandwidth either way once you're
admitted to a program you'll be
considered a full-fledged graduate
student at Stanford University you'll be
able to come to campus to attend
lectures and take exams or you can watch
most of your course lectures online
through live streams you may access the
libraries and other student facilities
you may connect directly with your
teaching team and the student Support
Services in your department when you
complete your program you'll earn the
same master's degree from Stanford
University as the one conferred on
full-time Stanford students and you'll
be invited to join your fellow
classmates as they walk the stage in the
University's Commencement
ceremonies if you're ready to give your
career a boost remember the incredible
value of stackability whether you want
to learn specific skills on a fast
timeline or try out a course to see if a
graduate program is right for you you
can begin with an individual graduate
course or courses if you want to learn
more about a topic and less time than it
takes to earn a master's degree you can
combine those courses with others in a
program to earn a graduate certificate
when you're ready to embrace a more
advanced and rigorous program and
depending on the policies of the program
you're admitted to you can seamlessly
transition graduate credits you've
already earned toward a master's degree
and each of these steps in your journey
you can enhance your resume by
showcasing your new found skills through
Stanford credentials
visit online. stanford.edu
